General.Name: Bio-FD&C Co. Ltd.
General.Description: BIO-FD&C Co.,Ltd. develops active ingredients for anti-aging cosmetics in South Korea. It offers plant cell, peptide, herbal extract, and biomolecule products for wrinkle improvement/skin regeneration, skin brightening, skin moisturizing, anti-inflammation/skin soothing, and anti-oxidation. The company was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in Incheon, South Korea.
General.Address: 509-512, B07, A-dong, Smartvalley, Incheon, South Korea
